examples.example: 走路慢点，这样能更好地欣赏沿途的风景。

translate.english: Walk slower so that you can better appreciate the scenery along the way.

examples.example: 我们做事慢点没关系，只要认真负责，就一定能把事情做好。

translate.english: It doesn't matter if we do things slowly, as long as we are serious and responsible, we will definitely be able to do things well.

examples.example: 干活的时候慢点，注意安全才是最重要的。

translate.english: Work slowly when working and pay attention to safety is the most important thing.
